content: earflap hat by grace cocking yarn & notions us13 and us11 dpns or preferred needles for small circumference knitting darning needle 1 stitch marker 1 skein gnome depot fiber portobello bulky 106yds and 25g 106yds cottonwood fluff *yarns are held double throughout samples clockwise from tl portobello bulky in blue razz cottonwood fluff in 86 remix natural + gourd-geous blue razz + 86 remix natural + 86 remix abbreviations & pm place marker techniques r row co cast on repeat repeat decrease decrease round round k knit sl slip k2tog knit 2 stitches together st s stitch es m marker p purl -german twisted co click pattern repeat r1 + r2 four more times with us13 co 64 using german twisted co work in stst k all sts until hat measures 8 from the center of an round 1 knit earflap unrolled or 7 5 when edge is left rolled round 2 k3 pm k18 pm k22 pm k18 pm k3 decrease section - change to us11 1 k7 k2tog around 64 sts ear flap round short row 2 k around -k3 sm **k11 turn make ds k 3 turn 3 k6 k2tog around 56 sts -*make ds knit to ds k ds k1 turn 4 k around -repeat *above row until 18 sts have been worked make ds k across 5 k5 k2tog around 48sts earflap sm** k22 sm work second ear flap from ** to ** k3 6 k around 7 k2tog around 24sts garter ridges 8 k2tog around 12 sts r1 purl 9 k2tog around 6sts r2 knit cut yarn and pull through earflap hat 1 @gnome_depot_fiber
